name: Dare Bioscience, Inc.
description: Dare Bioscience, Inc. is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company dedicated to addressing unmet medical needs in women's health. Founded in 2015, the company focuses on developing innovative therapies for conditions such as vaginal and reproductive health, particularly in areas where current treatment options are limited. Dare's lead product candidates include DARE-BV1, a treatment for bacterial vaginosis, and the DARE-HRT1, a novel hormone replacement therapy. The company employs a proprietary drug delivery technology to enhance the efficacy and safety of its products. With a commitment to scientific excellence and patient care, Dare aims to empower women by providing effective solutions that improve quality of life. The company's research and development efforts are guided by a team of experienced professionals with deep expertise in drug development and women's health. Dare Bioscience is on a mission to transform the landscape of women's healthcare through rigorous clinical trials and innovative product pipelines.
ceo: Samantha W. B. G. H. M. To

key_executives.name: Samantha W. B. G. H. M. To
Mark S. B. H. M. H. Wong

seo.meta_title: Dare Bioscience, Inc. | Innovating Women's Health
seo.meta_description: Explore Dare Bioscience, Inc., a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company focused on innovative therapies for women's health. Learn about our products and commitment to patient care.

faq.answer: Dare Bioscience focuses on developing innovative therapies for women's health.

faq.answer: Samantha W. B. G. H. M. To is the CEO of Dare Bioscience, Inc.

faq.answer: Dare Bioscience is headquartered in San Diego, California, USA.

faq.answer: Dare's main products include DARE-BV1 and DARE-HRT1.
